html_description:
Domain emails are in format `+@` like `+@expensify.com`. ### Problem We allow users to request money from domains in newDot. Update the code so we don't allow this action. ### Steps to reproduce: 1. From the global create button, select `Split expense`. 2. In the search field enter `+@applause.expensifail.com'` and confirm you are able to select that email as an option. ### Solution Update the code to prevent users from requesting money from domain emails. ### Solution Update the code to prevent users from requesting money from domain emails.
